en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors Myanmar National Chess Championships (Men/Women) 2009!
en.content:
REPORT FROM FUSIONEXCEL DIRECTOR MAUNG MAUNG LWIN, PRESIDENT OF MYANMAR CHESS FEDERATION.

In conjunction with the 35th Myanmar National Chess Championships (Men/Women) 2009, FusionExcel is proud to sponsor RM 2,500 for the printing of T-Shirts for the participants and provide 10 Quantum Pendants and 10 Quantum Flasks as prizes for the winners of both the Men’s and Women’s categories. The event, which was organized by the Myanmar Chess Federation, was held at the Aung San Stadium from February 2009 to 02nd March 2009, 2009, with the Opening Ceremony for the Finals held on February 2009 and the Prize Awarding Ceremony on 02nd March 2009, 2009. A total of 198 participants, including several top chess masters, took part in the Men’s category, with 16 finalists, selected after 11 elimination rounds, for the finals while 10 participants took part in the Women’s category. 

The Opening and Prize Awarding Ceremonies were well attended by the wives of several well-known local personalities and the Secretary General and members of the Myanmar Olympic Committee. FusionExcel Director Maung Maung Lwin, who is also the President of the Myanmar Chess Federation, represented FusionExcel. (seen here making the Opening Speech at the Ceremony).
